title: Breaking Down the Concept
text: Think about how data can be more than just indicators of past events.

title: The Role of Analytics
text: Consider how certain types of analytics can transform data from descriptive to actionable.

title: Immediate Measures
text: Reflect on what makes suggestions practical and straightforward.

title: From Insights to Actions
text: Think about actionable insights. How do they differ from mere observations?

hintAnswer: Go beyond what is happening or has happened and provide specific next steps.
title: Connecting Dots and Driving Decisions
text: Consider how connecting what's happening with future actions can drive effective decisions.
choices: Go beyond what is happening or has happened and provide specific next steps.
Include a detailed action plan for every attendee.
